General.Name: Green Battery Minerals Inc
General.Description: Green Battery Minerals Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of natural resource properties in Canada. The company explores for gold, lithium, and graphite. Its flagship project is the 100% owned Berkwood graphite project consisting of 74 claims totaling 5,714 hectares located in the Manicouagan Regional County Municipality, Quebec. The company was formerly known as Goldcore Resources Ltd. and changed its name to Green Battery Minerals Inc. in March 2021. Green the company was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada. Green Battery Minerals Inc. operates as a subsidiary of BJ Financial Accounting Consulting Inc.
General.Address: PO Box 48362, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7X 1A1
